p: Supervisors need to consider staff based factors when allocating duties, particularly if staff are redeployed to meet increasing clinical demand. When possible, such redeployment should be voluntary. 35 55 In addition, staff caring for affected patients should be rostered to appropriate work shifts with regular breaks. 12 40 43 During breaks, staff should be provided with food and other daily living supplies, 13 22 43 with the possibility of video contact with families to alleviate concerns. 22 Some staff might require alternative accommodation to reduce the risks of infecting their families. 22 33 67 On a societal level, stigma and discrimination against healthcare workers must be tackled. 15 40 41 50 51 66
